description: Unique identifier for a single contact status change event.
Date and time the status change was recorded in the system.
Application user who performed or recorded the status change.
Identifier of the contact (person/vendor/driver) whose status changed.
Snapshot of the contact’s external or legacy ID at change time; confirm with SME.
Snapshot of the contact’s name/description at the time of change for audit; confirm with SME.
Code representing the resulting contact status after the change.
Snapshot of the resulting status identifier at the time of change; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description text for the resulting status at the time of change.
Code representing the prior contact status before the change.
Snapshot of the prior status identifier at the time of change; confirm with SME.
Snapshot description text for the prior status at the time of change.
System-generated timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp when a user last updated this record; field name is misleading; confirm with SME.
User account that initially created this record.
User account that last modified this record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification to this record.
